title: Sea bream, cured squid dashi minestrone
description: Bryn brings you fresh and modern Japanese flavours.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz fresh root ginger, peeled and roughly chopped
50g/1¾oz courgette, balled using small parisian scoop
50g/1¾oz carrot, balled using small parisian scoop
1 large squid, cured on nori seaweed for 12 hours, thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
